CustomField.formula:
If(ISBLANK(HealthCloudGA__DeceasedDate__c),
IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Birthdate ) ) , TEXT(IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Birthdate ) ) , IF( DATE( 2000 , MONTH( Birthdate ) , DAY( Birthdate ) ) <= DATE( 2000 , MONTH( TODAY() ) , DAY( TODAY() ) ), YEAR (Today()) - YEAR ( Birthdate ), YEAR (Today()) - YEAR ( Birthdate ) -1 ), null))+ ' Years ', ''),
IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Birthdate ) ) , TEXT(IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Birthdate ) ) , IF( DATE( 2000 , MONTH( Birthdate ) , DAY( Birthdate ) ) <= DATE( 2000 , MONTH( HealthCloudGA__DeceasedDate__c ) , DAY( HealthCloudGA__DeceasedDate__c ) ), YEAR (HealthCloudGA__DeceasedDate__c) - YEAR ( Birthdate ), YEAR (HealthCloudGA__DeceasedDate__c) - YEAR ( Birthdate ) -1 ), null))+ ' Years ', '')
)
CustomField.label: Age
